author: Joshua Fluke
description:
CEOs on LinkedIn are officially losing it — like full-on meltdown mode. One says to charge your kids $1,200 in rent to “teach responsibility.” Another says remote work is “depressing,” and then admits he just needs friends. We’ve even got CEOs taking “friendship sabbaticals” to focus on… working more.

In this sequel to my last video, we dive into the chaos of corporate leadership — where every humblebrag is a cry for help and every “motivational” post sounds like a cry typed from the golf course. From guilt-tripping employees into the office to pretending layoffs are “new beginnings,” it’s the same LinkedIn circus — just with fancier suits.

If you’ve ever wondered how CEOs keep finding new ways to look relatable online — welcome to LinkedIn. You’re gonna love it here.

#CEOcringe #LinkedInLunatics #JoshuaFluke #CorporateCringe #antiwork

title: CEOS ACROSS LINKEDIN ARE LOSING IT!
